WelcomePage.Title: Welcome to Text Editor!
WelcomePage.Text: Quickly capture what's on your mind. Easily find it later in search. It's easy to capture a thought or list for yourself!

NoteForm.Title: Add new note:
NoteForm.Help: For automatically adding tags use '#' character and insert 'space' after finishing entering one or more tags.
NoteForm.ValidationError: Note text should includes at least 2 symbols

Messages.AddTagSuccess: Tag has been detected and successfully added!
